Ok the bad ending is not the true ending, It's just there for there to appeal to the downer side of the Netorare genre. The good ending is the real ending and everyone is happy, and Yuri is not cheating, it's just there to add the suspicion. God this one really hurts, but the true ending is the good one.

God did they really have to make the good ending ambiguous? Why is Yuri, the mother of these two kids, coming home late frequently? I get what they're trying to insinuate here but I'm going to pretend I don't see it. There's no reason for it at all. Yuri was entirely not like that.
This is the best ntr story i have read the rage is real
